timeline.id: Violative of Legal Framework': EC Asks X To Take Down Karnataka BJP's Video
timeline.title: Violative of Legal Framework': EC Asks X To Take Down Karnataka BJP's Video

image.caption: Violative of Legal Framework': EC Asks X To Take Down Karnataka BJP's Video

timeline.body: The Bengaluru police on Sunday, 5 May filed a First Information Report (FIR) against BJP president JP Nadda, state chief BY Vijayendra and the party's IT cell head Amit Malviya for "inciting hatred between two communities."

timeline.id: Cropped Video Viral As Kangana Ranaut Accepting People Will Not Vote For Her
timeline.title: Cropped Video Viral As Kangana Ranaut Accepting People Will Not Vote For Her

image.caption: Cropped Video Viral As Kangana Ranaut Accepting People Will Not Vote For Her

timeline.body: BOOM found that Ranaut was responding to a remark made by Himachal Congress president Pratibha Singh in the original video.

timeline.id: Old Photo Peddled As President Accompanying PM Modi To File LS Nomination
timeline.title: Old Photo Peddled As President Accompanying PM Modi To File LS Nomination

image.caption: Old Photo Peddled As President Accompanying PM Modi To File LS Nomination

timeline.body: BOOM found that the photo is from 2022, when Modi and other senior BJP leaders accompanied Murmu to file her candidature for the presidential post.

timeline.id: Video of Andhra Pradesh Minister Shared With False Claims Linked to Chhattisgarh
timeline.title: Video of Andhra Pradesh Minister Shared With False Claims Linked to Chhattisgarh

image.caption: Video of Andhra Pradesh Minister Shared With False Claims Linked to Chhattisgarh

timeline.body: Fact-check: A video of a YSRCP minister from Andhra Pradesh is being shared to falsely claim that it shows a SDM of Chhattisgarh at a mosque.  Vidadala Rajini, YSRCP minister from Andhra Pradesh has been misidentified in the video.

timeline.id: This Video Doesn’t Show Rahul Gandhi Visiting Ayodhya After Filing Nomination
timeline.title: This Video Doesn’t Show Rahul Gandhi Visiting Ayodhya After Filing Nomination

image.caption: This Video Doesn’t Show Rahul Gandhi Visiting Ayodhya After Filing Nomination

timeline.body: Fact-Check | An unrelated video is being shared to falsely claim that Congress leader Rahul Gandhi visited Ayodhya after filing nomination for 2024 Lok Sabha Elections.

timeline.id: Fake Letter About 'Financial Support' to Muslim Voters in Karnataka Goes Viral
timeline.title: Fake Letter About 'Financial Support' to Muslim Voters in Karnataka Goes Viral

image.caption: Fake Letter About 'Financial Support' to Muslim Voters in Karnataka Goes Viral

timeline.body: Fact-Check: A purported letter claiming to give financial support for Muslim voters going for polling in the ongoing elections is being shared on social media platforms. However, the letter is fake.
